title: My Father's Colors-The Drama-Filled Journey of Naya Mon Continues
description: Book #2 in the Naya Moná Series. Naya Monà  is searching for a daughter she didn't know she gave birth to. Her husband, Chris, is fighting to accomplish the remove all traces of Naya's pain. Misty is a blast from the past that just won't go away. She's seeking fame and fortune and will do whatever it takes to get both. Author Marian L. Thomas, presents three characters that will take you on an emotional ride.
author: Marian L. Thomas
